name: raucous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
loud and unpleasant: I heard the raucous call of the crows. Raucous laughter came from the next room. The party was becoming rather raucous. Synonym
rowdy disapproving

loud, excited, and not controlled, esp. in an unpleasant way: raucous laughter
